header.author: John Theobald
header.title: Every man his own physician. Being, a complete collection of efficacious and approved remedies, for every disease incident to the human body. With plain instructions for their common use. Necessary to be had in all families, particularly those residing in the country. By John Theobald, M.D. Author of Medulla Medicinae. Compiled at the command of his Royal Highness the Duke of Cumberland.
